title: Sulfur doped carbon nanofiber as stable and high performance anode materials for sodium-ion batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00478G, Paper
Mengwei Lu, Ying Huang, Xianping Du, Xitong Sheng
Carbon nanofibers are deemed as ideal sodium-ion batteries (SIBs) anode materials due to their unique structure, but their low capacity limited its further development. Heteroatom modification is one of the...
